bibl.title: The Tebtunis Papyri at The Bancroft Library.
bibl.note: The Tebtunis Papyri arrived in Berkeley in 1938 and came to The Bancroft Library in 1973. The task lying ahead is enormous. Most urgent is the restoration, cleaning, and remounting of the pieces presently housed in Vinylite, in order to prevent further physical damage to the papyrus.

bibl.title: Bancroftiana [The Bancroft Library, University of California, Berkeley]

bibl.seg: VERHOOGT Arthur, The Tebtunis Papyri at The Bancroft Library.
Bancroftiana [The Bancroft Library, University of California, Berkeley] 107 (June 1994) pp. 4-7, 2 figg.

The Tebtunis Papyri arrived in Berkeley in 1938 and came to The Bancroft Library in 1973. The task lying ahead is enormous. Most urgent is the restoration, cleaning, and remounting of the pieces presently housed in Vinylite, in order to prevent further physical damage to the papyrus.
